mapper.sql: id, cover_url, supplierl_name, supplierl_desc, province_name, province_code, city_name, city_code, district_name, district_code, web_url, type, industry, app_type, pattern_type, iicense_url, user_name, user_id, user_phone, user_mali, user_address, source, user_create_time, del_state, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_supplier( id, cover_url, supplierl_name, supplierl_desc, province_name, province_code, city_name, city_code, district_name, district_code, web_url, type, industry, app_type, pattern_type, iicense_url, user_name, user_id, user_phone, user_mali, user_address, source, user_create_time, del_state, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.coverUrl}, #{item.supplierlName}, #{item.supplierlDesc}, #{item.provinceName}, #{item.provinceCode}, #{item.cityName}, #{item.cityCode}, #{item.districtName}, #{item.districtCode}, #{item.webUrl}, #{item.type}, #{item.industry}, #{item.appType}, #{item.patternType}, #{item.iicenseUrl}, #{item.userName}, #{item.userId}, #{item.userPhone}, #{item.userMali}, #{item.userAddress}, #{item.source, typeHandler=com.camelot.kuka.common.mybatis.handler.EnumTypeHandler}, #{item.userCreateTime}, #{item.delState, typeHandler=com.camelot.kuka.common.mybatis.handler.EnumTypeHandler}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateBy} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_supplier
cover_url = #{coverUrl},
supplierl_name = #{supplierlName},
supplierl_desc = #{supplierlDesc},
province_name = #{provinceName},
province_code = #{provinceCode},
city_name = #{cityName},
city_code = #{cityCode},
district_name = #{districtName},
district_code = #{districtCode},
web_url = #{webUrl},
type = #{type},
industry = #{industry},
app_type = #{appType},
pattern_type = #{patternType},
iicense_url = #{iicenseUrl},
user_name = #{userName},
user_id = #{userId},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
user_mali = #{userMali},
user_address = #{userAddress},
source = #{source, typeHandler=com.camelot.kuka.common.mybatis.handler.EnumTypeHandler},
user_create_time = #{userCreateTime},
del_state = #{delState, typeHandler=com.camelot.kuka.common.mybatis.handler.EnumTypeHandler},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy}
WHERE id = #{id}
